arguments.template:
<sky-tile-dashboard-column
  *ngFor="let column of config?.layout?.multiColumn"
  class="sky-tile-dashboard-layout-multi"
  [ngStyle]="{
    'flex-basis': (100 / config?.layout?.multiColumn.length) + '%'
  }"
>
</sky-tile-dashboard-column>
<sky-tile-dashboard-column class="sky-tile-dashboard-layout-single" #singleColumn>
</sky-tile-dashboard-column>
<ng-content></ng-content>

<sky-tile-dashboard-column
  *ngFor="let column of config?.layout?.multiColumn"
  class="sky-tile-dashboard-layout-multi"
  [ngStyle]="{
    'flex-basis': (100 / config?.layout?.multiColumn.length) + '%'
  }"
>
</sky-tile-dashboard-column>
<sky-tile-dashboard-column class="sky-tile-dashboard-layout-single" #singleColumn>
</sky-tile-dashboard-column>
<ng-content></ng-content>
